ygData.subject: Re: attachments disabled
ygData.msgSnippet: Amen to that.  I too do not open attachments.  This is not a big concern for me.  Everything I get goes through my virus filter which is updated every few
ygData.messageBody:
Amen to that. I too do not open attachments. This is not a big concern for
me. Everything I get goes through my virus filter which is updated every
few days.

I love this mailing list and am having a great time listening to everyone.
Thank you for creating this and to everyone for keeping up the good
conversations.



----- Original Message -----
From: Suzanne Johnson <katannah@...>
To: <EQ_women@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, June 28, 1999 1:00 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_women] attachments disabled


> From: Suzanne Johnson <katannah@...>
>
> It's an oversight that is readily forgiven on my part. Course, I don't
open
> attachments......heh. Don't beat yourself up; there's enough people out
there in the Real
> World who are all too willing to do it for ya. <smiles>
> Sara, Povar
>
> truffle@... wrote:
>
> > From: truffle@...
> >
> > I've disabled attachments on the mailing list. Sorry that I didn't know
to do so before!
